hackathon-description-text: Four awards will be offered at PilotPhilly:
hackathon-rules: "Move fast and break things" ... but not anything in McClelland!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA 19104, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the app interesting and new?
Is the app friendly and eye-catching?
Is the pitch engaging and well-structured?
Is the presentation professional and does it run smoothly?

hackathon-location-address: University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA 19104, USA
hackathon-description-header: When you come to Pilot, you’ll work in a team of 4 students to brainstorm an idea, bring it to life, and then demo and pitch it for a chance to win prizes and awards. All in just 24 hours.
